q: If the sphere were heavier, what would not happen? a) The sphere would collide with the yellow object. b) The sphere would collide with the cylinder
a: a) The sphere would collide with the yellow object.

q: Which event would not happen if the yellow rubber cube were heavier? a) The yellow rubber cube and the purple cylinder would collide. b)The yellow rubber cube and the yellow cylinder would collide
a: a) The yellow rubber cube and the purple cylinder would collide

q: Which event would happen if the red object were heavier? a) The gray cylinder and the cyan object would collide. b) The metal cylinder would collide with the purple cylinder
a: a) The gray cylinder and the cyan object would collide
